bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: E2E tests are failing; can't find studyjob deployment
bug.description:
Here's a failing postsubmt run <denchmark-link:https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/kubeflow_kubeflow/kubeflow-postsubmit/1139677020716797952>https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/kubeflow_kubeflow/kubeflow-postsubmit/1139677020716797952</denchmark-link>
The error is <denchmark-code>> raise ApiException(http_resp=r) E kubernetes.client.rest.ApiException: (404) E Reason: Not Found E HTTP response headers: HTTPHeaderDict({'Audit-Id': '8182e147-6558-4396-ba95-632c001b604e', 'Content-Length': '252', 'Date': 'Fri, 14 Jun 2019 23:53:35 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}) E HTTP response body: {"kind":"Status","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{},"status":"Failure","message":"deployments.extensions \"studyjob-controller\" not found","reason":"NotFound","details":{"name":"studyjob-controller","group":"extensions","kind":"deployments"},"code":404}
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/kubernetes/client/rest.py:222: ApiException </denchmark-code>
The postsubmit started failing on 06/13. I suspect it is related to this PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/pull/128>kubeflow/manifests#128</denchmark-link>
Related to: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/2630>#2630</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lluunn>@lluunn</denchmark-link> : Closing this issue.
In response to this:
I think this is fixed /close
Instructions for interacting with me using PR comments are available here. If you have questions or suggestions related to my behavior, please file an issue against the kubernetes/test-infra repository.
